comment: Mohan Lanka Foundation is helping marginalised people with essential medicines and PPE to fight emerging variants of COVID-19.

Under Mohan Lanka Foundation Community Based Management of Acute Malnutrition program implemented to address malnutrition frontline workers did a door to door survey of children and anthropometric measurements of 0-5 years of children.

Mohan Lanka Foundation has done notable work in improving health & nutrition of children by implementing innovative programs like Community Based Management of Acute Malnutrition in the Northern Province of the Country.
